divs: Sighting DetailsI was Ten years old, I made a walk about every other day approx 3 miles to get 5 gallons of kerosene for our stove. There was snow on the mountain road. As I was about one mile into my trek with the kerosene heading back to our small mountain home, I noticed a bright light following me through the trees. I got scared and tried to run, but the 5 gallon can of kerosene was slowing me down. It was just about dark and I was surrounded by mountain treeline with no neigbors. The light followed me for about half a mile to one mile, then finally disapeared behind a hill. I could not tell what the light source was and that made me even more scared. When I returned home, there was a friend of my Father's at the home. He was talking to my Father stating that he was approaching the house after using the "Outhouse" and noticed a large object above the house. I overheard the conversation, and explained what I saw. We all joked and said that we saw a "UFO". To this day, I am not sure what it was. My Father claimed that the house had lost all electricity for a few moments at the same time his friend was using the Outhouse. We were country and seemed like another mountain event at the time. Carl Shaw
trends: There have been no other sightings in Stephens City
This sighting has never been favorited.
